name: monday-com
description: MCP Server to interact with Monday.com boards and items.

MONDAY_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with the Monday.com API.

MONDAY_WORKSPACE_NAME.description: The name of the Monday.com workspace you are working with.

tools.name: monday-create-item
tools.description: Create a new item in a Monday.com Board. Optionally, specify the parent Item ID to create a Sub-item.

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the Item or Sub-item is on.

itemTitle.description: Name of the Monday.com Item or Sub-item that will be created.

groupId.description: Monday.com Board's Group ID to create the Item in. If set, parentItemId should not be set.

parentItemId.description: Monday.com Item ID to create the Sub-item under. If set, groupId should not be set.

columnValues.description: Dictionary of column values to set {column_id: value}

tools.name: monday-get-items-by-id
tools.description: Fetch specific Monday.com item by its ID

itemId.description: ID of the Monday.com item to fetch.

tools.name: monday-update-item
tools.description: Update a Monday.com item's or sub-item's column values.

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the Item or Sub-item is on.

itemId.description: Monday.com Item or Sub-item ID to update the columns of.

columnValues.description: Dictionary of column values to update the Monday.com Item or Sub-item with. ({column_id: value})

tools.name: monday-get-board-columns
tools.description: Get the Columns of a Monday.com Board.

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the Item or Sub-item is on.

tools.name: monday-get-board-groups
tools.description: Get the Groups of a Monday.com Board.

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the Item or Sub-item is on.

tools.name: monday-create-update
tools.description: Create an update (comment) on a Monday.com Item or Sub-item.

updateText.description: Content to update the Item or Sub-item with.

tools.name: monday-list-boards
tools.description: Get all Boards from Monday.com

limit.description: Maximum number of Monday.com Boards to return.

tools.name: monday-list-items-in-groups
tools.description: List all items in the specified groups of a Monday.com board

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the Item or Sub-item is on.

tools.name: monday-list-subitems-in-items
tools.description: List all Sub-items of a list of Monday.com Items

tools.name: monday-create-board
tools.description: Create a new Monday.com board

board_name.description: Name of the Monday.com board to create

board_kind.description: Kind of the Monday.com board to create (public, private, shareable). Default is public.

tools.name: monday-create-board-group
tools.description: Create a new group in a Monday.com board

boardId.description: Monday.com Board ID that the group will be created in.

groupName.description: Name of the group to create.

tools.name: monday-move-item-to-group
tools.description: Move an item to a group in a Monday.com board

groupId.description: Monday.com Group ID to move the Item to.

tools.name: monday-delete-item
tools.description: Delete an item from a Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-archive-item
tools.description: Archive an item from a Monday.com board

tools.name: monday-get-item-updates
tools.description: Get updates for a specific item in Monday.com

itemId.description: ID of the Monday.com item to get updates for.

limit.description: Maximum number of updates to retrieve. Default is 25.

tools.name: monday-get-docs
tools.description: Get a list of documents from Monday.com, optionally filtered by folder

limit.description: Maximum number of documents to retrieve. Default is 25.

folder_id.description: Optional folder ID to filter documents by.

tools.name: monday-get-doc-content
tools.description: Get the content of a specific document by ID

doc_id.description: ID of the Monday.com document to retrieve.

tools.name: monday-create-doc
tools.description: Create a new document in Monday.com

title.description: Title of the document to create.

content.description: Content of the document to create.

folder_id.description: Optional folder ID to create the document in.

tools.name: monday-add-doc-block
tools.description: Add a block to a document

doc_id.description: ID of the Monday.com document to add a block to.

block_type.description: Type of block to add (normal_text, bullet_list, numbered_list, heading, divider, etc.).

content.description: Content of the block to add.

after_block_id.description: Optional ID of the block to add this block after.

tools.name: monday-get-item-files
tools.description: Get files (PDFs, documents, images, etc.) attached to a Monday.com item

itemId.description: ID of the Monday.com item to get files from.

tools.name: monday-get-update-files
tools.description: Get files (PDFs, documents, images, etc.) attached to a specific update in Monday.com

updateId.description: ID of the Monday.com update to get files from.
